description.displayText: Chaya babysat for us for about 5 months. We have 8 year old twins - one with autism and ADHD. Her work with that twin was completely amazing - I felt like I was paying for a floor time therapist more than a babysitter, in many ways! Chaya would make a great addition to any household, but I believe she is especially gifted at working with children who have a disability.
